graphql.query:
mutation CreatePost {
    createPost(
        input: {
            title: "meowwwww"
            media: ["{{new_profile_pic}}","{{new_profile_pic}}","{{new_profile_pic}}"]
            contenttype: image
        }
        action: Zhopa  
    ) {
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
        }
         
    }
}

            media: ["{{new_profile_pic}}","{{new_profile_pic}}","{{new_profile_pic}}"]

        meta {

        }

}

        postid: null
        title: null
        tag: null
        from: null
        to: null
        offset: null
        limit: null
        commentOffset: null
        commentLimit: null
    ) {
        counter
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
                isreported
                user {

                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                isreported
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
}
            }
        }
    }
}

query Getallposts {
    listPosts(
        filterBy: null
        IgnorList: YES
        sortBy: null
        userid: null
        postid: null
        title: null
        tag: Zhopa
        from: null
        to: null
        offset: null
        limit: null
        commentOffset: null
        commentLimit: null
    ) {
        counter
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                isliked
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
                isreported
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                isreported
                visibilityStatus
          isHiddenForUsers
                hasActiveReports
}
            }
        }
    }
}

query Getallposts {
    listPosts(
        filterBy: null
        IgnorList: YES
        sortBy: null
        userid: null
        postid: "{{uuid}}"
        title: null
        tag: null
        from: null
        to: null
        offset: null
        limit: null
        commentOffset: null
        commentLimit: null
    ) {
        counter
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            visibilityStatus
            hasActiveReports
            amountreports
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            url
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                visibilityStatus
                hasActiveReports
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
                isreported
                isfriend
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                visibilityStatus
                hasActiveReports
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                amountreports
                isreported
                isliked
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    visibilityStatus
                    hasActiveReports
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                    isreported
                    isfriend
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

query GuestListPost {
    guestListPost(postid: "{{uuid}}") {
        status
        ResponseCode
        affectedRows {
            id
            contenttype
            title
            media
            cover
            mediadescription
            createdat
            visibilityStatus
            hasActiveReports
            amountreports
            amountlikes
            amountviews
            amountcomments
            amountdislikes
            amounttrending
            isliked
            isviewed
            isreported
            isdisliked
            issaved
            tags
            url
            user {
                id
                username
                slug
                img
                visibilityStatus
                hasActiveReports
                isfollowed
                isfollowing
                isreported
                isfriend
            }
            comments {
                commentid
                userid
                postid
                parentid
                content
                createdat
                visibilityStatus
                hasActiveReports
                amountlikes
                amountreplies
                amountreports
                isreported
                isliked
                user {
                    id
                    username
                    slug
                    img
                    visibilityStatus
                    hasActiveReports
                    isfollowed
                    isfollowing
                    isreported
                    isfriend
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

query GetProfile {
    getProfile(postLimit: 20, userid: "{{uuid}}") {
        meta {
            status
            RequestId
            ResponseCode
            ResponseMessage
        }
        affectedRows {
            id
            username
            status
            slug
            img
            biography
            isfollowed
            isfollowing
            amountposts
            amounttrending
            amountfollowed
            amountfollower
            amountfriends
            amountblocked
            imageposts {
                id
                title
                contenttype
                media
                createdat
            }
            textposts {
                id
                title
                contenttype
                media
                createdat
            }
            videoposts {
                id
                title
                contenttype
                media
                createdat
            }
            audioposts {
                id
                title
                contenttype
                media
                createdat
            }
        }
    }
}
